Package fr.warzou.virtualcard.core.modules.link

Interface Size

All Known Subinterfaces:
Linkable, UniqueCaptorLinkable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContainer, Container, Container.AbstractDefaultContainer, Container.AbstractIndexedContainer, Container.DefaultContainer, Conveyor, Conveyor.DefaultConveyor, Dropper, Dropper.DefaultDropper
public interface Size
Define the size of all module face. This was implemented for the Linkable interface to make easier every linkage checks and getters.
Author:
Warzou

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default boolean isLinkable​(Point point)
    Check if a Point is linkable.
    Point[] linkablePoint()
    This method return every point who is allow the module linkage, notably use for LinkedModule
    int[] size()
    This methode allow to get the different face size of this module, notably use for LinkedModule.

  • Method Details

    • size

      int[] size()
      This methode allow to get the different face size of this module, notably use for LinkedModule.
      Returns:
      Size for all face in order (LinkedModule.Face.LEFT, LinkedModule.Face.RIGHT, LinkedModule.Face.FRONT, LinkedModule.Face.BEHIND, LinkedModule.Face.UP, LinkedModule.Face.DOWN)

    • linkablePoint

      Point[] linkablePoint()
      This method return every point who is allow the module linkage, notably use for LinkedModule
      Returns:
      Every point could support module linkage.

    • isLinkable

      default boolean isLinkable​(Point point)
      Check if a Point is linkable.
      Parameters:
      point - Target Point to be checked
      Returns:
      true if linkablePoint() contain the target point, and false otherwise
